title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Computer application of project scheduling and management through MS Project 2007, Primavera; project estimating, project planning and project scheduling, network analysis, critical path methods and PERT analysis. project time reduction and optimization, resource levelling, project time, cost and finance management.
